when_to_say: Used to refer to a set of written, printed, or blank pages.
example: أنا أقرأ كتابًا جديدًا. (ana aqra' kitaaban jadeedan.) - I am reading a new book.

when_to_say: Used to refer to an instrument for writing.
example: لقد فقدت قلمي. (laqad faqadtu qalamii.) - I lost my pen.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a book for writing notes.
example: لدي دفتر جديد. (ladayya daftar jadeed.) - I have a new notebook.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a tool for removing pencil marks.
example: أحتاج إلى ممحاة. (ahtaaju ila mimhaa.) - I need an eraser.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a tool used to measure length or draw straight lines.
example: أين المسطرة؟ (ayna al-misṭara?) - Where is the ruler?

when_to_say: Used to refer to a flat surface used for writing or displaying information.
example: اللوحة نظيفة. (al-lawḥa naẓīfa.) - The board is clean.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a place where books are kept.
example: أنا ذاهب إلى المكتبة. (ana dhaahib ila al-maktaba.) - I am going to the library.

when_to_say: Used to refer to an institution for higher education.
example: الجامعة كبيرة. (al-jaami'a kabeera.) - The university is large.

when_to_say: Used to refer to a room where lessons are taught.
example: الفصل نظيف ومرتب. (al-faṣl naẓīf wa murattab.) - The classroom is clean and organized.

when_to_say: Used to refer to the activity of learning or reviewing information.
example: أحتاج إلى وقت للدراسة. (aḥtāju ila waqt lil-dirāsa.) - I need time for studying.
